CustomField.description: The unique technical name the agent uses internally to request this specific action. Must be unique across all actions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Required. A unique, machine-readable name for this action definition used internally by the framework and APIs. Must be unique across all Action Definitions. Follow standard API naming conventions: use underscores instead of spaces, start with a letter, contain only letters, numbers, and underscores (e.g., Create_Case, Get_Opportunity_Products). This is the identifier for the reusable action logic itself.
CustomField.label: Developer Name
